## InternalState type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type InternalState = {
    active: boolean;
    priority: number;
    frames: number;
    lastProps: StoreProps;
    lastEvent: {
        current: DomEvent | null;
    };
    interaction: THREE.Object3D[];
    hovered: Map<string, ThreeEvent<DomEvent>>;
    subscribers: Subscription[];
    capturedMap: Map<number, Map<THREE.Object3D, PointerCaptureTarget>>;
    initialClick: [x: number, y: number];
    initialHits: THREE.Object3D[];
    xr: {
        connect: () => void;
        disconnect: () => void;
    };
    subscribe: (callback: RenderCallback, priority?: number) => () => void;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [ThreeEvent](./solid-three.threeevent.md)<!-- -->, [Subscription](./solid-three.subscription.md)<!-- -->, [RenderCallback](./solid-three.rendercallback.md)
